text: Improvement pill here today we're going
to talk about a skill that can quite
literally change your life the ability
to bend reality I want you to consider a
hypothetical situation okay you're in a
car driving to work and someone cuts
right in front of you right before you
make a turn so you think to yourself man
what an people in this city
they're selfish and arrogant and you
feel yourself getting angrier and
angrier and guess what you spend the
rest of your commute to work thinking
about things you should have could have
would have said to that driver but what
if in that car was a single mother her
daughter of only 8 years old little
Diane is in the back seat struggling to
breathe see Diane was born with a
pre-existing lung condition she's having
another serious asthma attack and her
mom is rushing her to the hospital
praying while she drives that she makes
it in time if you knew this information
while you were cut off by that car how
would you feel would you still be angry
is Diane's mom still selfish and
arrogant now I want you to consider
another hypothetical situ situation so
let's say you decide to embark on a
self-development journey congratulations
you've mustered up the courage to go out
and work on your social skills good for
you you walk down the street and you see
an attractive girl and you say to
yourself okay okay I can do this you
must thr up the courage you take the
leap and you approach her hi my name is
and before you even get to say your name
she ignores you and walks right past you
most guys in this scenario would react
by thinking oh it's because I'm not
good-looking enough or oh it's my
ethnicity it's my skin color it's my
height and they immediately go home and
they promise themselves they'll never
talk to another woman again because
what's the point they were born with
imperfections and they'll never get a
woman to love them the world is just an
unfair place on the other hand when a
girl ignores me and walks away which has
happened countless times before the
first thought on my mind is well she's
probably having a bad day or oh she
looks really busy she must have an
appointment and the interesting thing
about this is that you'll never know for
sure what was actually going on with
Diane's mom or what was going on in
Jane's head when she ignored you I mean
unless you somehow managed to sit them
down and interview them you'll never
find out what just happened to them an
hour ago what happened with their family
that morning what happened in school
just the other day so in cases like this
you decide what the reality is is there
a chance Diane's mom was actually an
and cut you off for no reason
absolutely but was there also a chance
that she was just trying to get Diane to
the hospital you bet it's up to to you
which reality you choose to live in and
that reality becomes the reality you
live in wait what well your body quite
literally ends up reacting to it if you
thought Jane ignored you because of your
height well your self-esteem would have
dropped instantly and you lose all of
the motivation and all of that courage
you managed to muster up that day you
would have dragged yourself home moped
around and probably stuffed yourself
with junk food and watched Netflix until
you passed out but if Jane ignored you
because she was running late to her job
interview after being unemployed for an
entire year well that's a whole
different scenario isn't it your
self-esteem isn't online for that
reality you wouldn't lose nearly as much
motivation so as this video title States
this is how you bend reality you simply
choose whatever story you want to live
in I don't know about you but I'd prefer
to choose the story that doesn't make me
feel like crap an important thing to
keep in mind is that you have to be wary
of living in realities that are
completely false let's say for example
all of the girls you're approaching are
slack ining you they're calling you a
creep and they're calling the cops
chances are it's not cuz all of them had
bad days it's probably because you're
doing something wrong maybe it's because
you haven't showered in like a month so
keep in mind that you should only bend
the reality of stories that are open to
interpretation which honestly makes up
an overwhelmingly large amount of the
